headlines.description: Bournemouth defender Nathan Ake scored a stoppage time winner to break nine-man Tottenham's resistance and earn a 1-0 victory.

video.headline: Bournemouth's Ake finally makes Spurs pay in injury time

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC One-play (Bournemouth’s Ake finally makes Spurs pay in injury-time) 2019/05/04 US ONLY

headlines.description: Two goals from Marko Arnautovic and Ryan Fredericks's first Premier League strike helped West Ham beat Southampton 3-0 at London Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arnautovic ends drought as West Ham sink Southampton

headlines.description: A Leander Dendoncker volley gave Wolverhampton Wanderers a 1-0 victory over Fulham at Molineux to put them on the verge of a seventh-place.

video.headline: Wolves close in on European football with win

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Wolves top Fulham to close on European chance) 2019/05/04 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves on verge of seventh-placed finish with win over Fulham

headlines.description: Cardiff City manager Neil Warnock said relegation from the Premier League was insignificant compared to the tragic death of Emiliano Sala.

video.headline: Cardiff's relegation confirmed after Palace defeat

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Cardiff’s relegation confirmed after Palace defeat) 2019/05/04 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Cardiff relegated after loss to Palace

headlines.description: Liverpool's Premier League title bid stayed alive with a dramatic 3-2 win at Newcastle United in a match that saw Mohamed Salah stretchered off.

video.headline: Origi: Liverpool showed a fighting spirit

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Interview (Origi: Liverpool showed a fighting spirit) 2019/05/04 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool pull off dramatic win as Salah injured
